  • Constructor Details

    • AccountController

      public AccountController()
      Constructor to initialize the DAOs used by this controller.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the account page with user data, loads the logo, profile image, and calculates the user's total score.

    • handleSaveProfile

      public void handleSaveProfile()
      Handles the action of saving the user profile after updating information. It checks for field validations such as matching passwords and valid email address.

    • handleDeleteProfile

      public void handleDeleteProfile()
      Handles the action of deleting the user profile. (Functionality is not yet implemented)

    • handleBackButtonClick

      public void handleBackButtonClick()
      Handles the action of returning to the home page. It loads the home page FXML when the user clicks the return button.

    • displayError

      public void displayError(String text)
      Displays an error message with a red color, visible for 2 seconds.
      Parameters:
      text - The error message to be displayed.

    • displaySuccess

      public void displaySuccess(String text)
      Displays a success message with a green color, visible for 2 seconds.
      Parameters:
      text - The success message to be displayed.

    • isValidEmailAddress

      public boolean isValidEmailAddress(String email)
      Validates the given email address using a regex pattern.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address to be validated.
      Returns:
      true if the email is valid, false otherwise.

    • onOpen

      public void onOpen()
      Opens a file chooser dialog to select an image file and updates the user's profile image.

    • loadImage

      public void loadImage()
      Loads the user's profile image from the database or sets a default profile image.

    • updateImage

      public void updateImage(File file)
      Updates the user's profile image in the database.
      Parameters:
      file - The image file selected by the user.
